articles.description: Zelensky, 44, could briefly appear either via a live broadcast or taped message. But sources are concerned about the ceremony becoming politicised, given the current war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky has been in talks with the Academy Awards to speak during Sunday's ceremony.
Zelensky, himself a former actor, could briefly appear at the Oscars - either via … [+2601 chars]

articles.description: TOM LEONARD: Hollywood loves to brag about box-office numbers, but one statistic it prefers to keep quiet about nowadays is the ratings for the Academy Awards because it is so woke.
articles.content:
